title: CANADIAN LAWYERS PROTEST ATTACK ON INDEPENDENCE OF JUDICIARY IN SRI LANKA
content: By Walter Jayawardhana Protesting against the impeachment of Dr.Shirani Bandaranayaka Lawyers Rights Watch Canada said, that the international legal community has cautioned the Sri Lankan government for months that efforts to impeach the Chief Justice would be viewed as an attack on the independence of the judiciary and a derogation of the rule of law…
